full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHING SO CHUG THU NO MON KHANG GI SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN DAR DBANG PHYUG GI KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES CHING SO CHUG THU NO MONG KHANG GI SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN DAR DBANG PHYUG GI KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS 'DI NI SAN NO YON GYI AEL MAG AER TE NI DE'I CHER GUNG MI 'GYUR RDO RJE, CHING SO CHUG THU NO MONG KHANG GI GRA PA GUSHR'I CHOS RJES KUN DGA' RIN CHEN, AEL CHE AER TE NI CHOS RJES BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN, THON MGRON GNYER YE SHES BSTAN DAR, GSOL DPON CHE CHEN THON BLO BZANG DPAL 'BYOR, SPI LIG THU DGE BSKOS @005A *, ,BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS, 'GAG PA BLO BZANG BSAM GTAN SOGS KYIS GTZOS GRVA TSANG BZHI'I GRA MANG, SBYIN BDAG GSER SKYA RNAMS DANG, SAN NO YON KHO SHOS CHING DBANG GI AE CHE SMAN RAM PA AER TE NI SPI LIG THU SLOB DPON RGYA MTSO LEGS GRUB, DA LA'I DBANG GI AEL CHI GSOL DPON BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO, SPI LIG THU CHOS RJES DES LEGS LHUN GRUB, JA SAG AER TE NI DUR KHE CHE'I PHU BO THON BLO BZANG DGE LEGS, DAR KHANG THON BLO BZANG DPAL 'BYOR SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR LHA CHEN TSANGS PA CHEN PO'I LUNG GI DON BZHIN, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GSOL DPON BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GO ,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
